Package it.polimi.ingsw.communication.timeout_handler

Class TimeoutHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.communication.timeout_handler.TimeoutHandler
class TimeoutHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Main TimeoutHandler class Handles the sendAndWait of Client and Server

  • Method Details

    • getNewSemaphore

      private java.util.concurrent.Semaphore getNewSemaphore()
      private method to create a new semaphore
      Returns:
      the newly created semaphore

    • tryDisengage

      public void tryDisengage​(int messageTimeoutID) throws RequestTimedOutException
      tries to stop a timer from running out. This doesn't unlock the thread stuck waiting, it only stops the timeout from going off while the message received is executed. This is made to prevent a timeout from running out while the Message is being executed, potentially breaking the game logic.
      Parameters:
      messageTimeoutID - ID to stop
      Throws:
      RequestTimedOutException - thrown if the timeout has already expired

    • clearID

      private void clearID​(int messageTimeoutID)
      unregisters the timeoutID
      Parameters:
      messageTimeoutID - to be unregistered

    • sendAndWait

      public void sendAndWait​(ServerMessage serverMessage, int timeoutInSeconds) throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
      Sends serverMessage to the Server and awaits answer for timeoutInSeconds time
      Parameters:
      serverMessage - message to be sent
      timeoutInSeconds - timeout in seconds to wait for a server answer; -1 to wait indefinitely
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - thrown when timeout is expired

    • setupTimerAndGetSemaphore

      private java.util.concurrent.Semaphore setupTimerAndGetSemaphore​(SerializedNetworkMessage message, int messageTimeoutID)

    • sendAndWait

      public void sendAndWait​(ClientMessage clientMessage, int timeoutInSeconds) throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
      Sends clientMessage to the Server and awaits answer for timeoutInSeconds time
      Parameters:
      clientMessage - message to be sent
      timeoutInSeconds - timeout in seconds to wait for a server answer; -1 to wait indefinitely
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - thrown when timeout is expired

    • pauseHandler

      private void pauseHandler​(int timeoutInSeconds, java.util.concurrent.Semaphore semaphore, int messageTimeoutID) throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException
      Core method of the class This class launches 2 semaphore, the first one is the actual timer, the second one exist to allow the message to execute and then releases the method
      Parameters:
      timeoutInSeconds - timeout to wait
      semaphore - to wait on
      messageTimeoutID - ID of the message to send in the TimeoutException
      Throws:
      java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - thrown if timeout is reached

    • defuse

      public void defuse​(int timeoutID)
      definitely removes the timer and releases the waiting thread.
      Parameters:
      timeoutID - timeoutID to release

    • timeoutExpired

      private void timeoutExpired​(int messageTimeoutID)
      sets the message timeout map to false, when a message containing this timeout is received an error is thrown
      Parameters:
      messageTimeoutID - timeoutID

    • getID

      private int getID()
      gets a new randomized id
      Returns:
      timeoutID
